metadata.title: CVE-2017-15928 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In the Ox gem 2.8.0 for Ruby, the process crashes with a segmentation faultwhen a crafted input is supplied to parse_obj. NOTE: the vendor has stated"Ox should handle the error more gracefully" but has not confirmed asecurity implication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15928` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-ox - 2.8.2-1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-ox package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.2-1build2').
